mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PROCESS_PICT_MES ( ID, ORDER_NO, CUSTOM_NO, PROD_NO, CRAFWORK_ID, SERIAL, PICTURES, FILE_NAME, SEND_EMP, SENT_DATE, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serial,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sentDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_PROCESS_PICT_MES.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE PROCESS_PICT_MES
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOM_NO = #{customNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRAFWORK_ID = #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SERIAL = #{serial,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PICTURES = #{pictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_EMP = #{sendEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SENT_DATE = #{sentDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
